Class CaliSmall

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      edu.uci.calismall.CaliSmall

public class CaliSmall
extends Activity

A simple proof of concept for Calico on Android devices.

Author:
Michele Bonazza

actionToString

public static String actionToString(int action)

adjustForZoom

public PointF adjustForZoom(float x,
                            float y)
Returns a point with (x, y) coordinates set to be displayed on the current canvas.

Parameters:
x - the X-axis value
y - the Y-axis value
Returns:
a new point to which the current scale factor and offset have been applied

pointToString

public static String pointToString(PointF point)
Returns what PointF.toString() should have returned, but Android developers were too lazy to implement.

Parameters:
point - the point of which a String representation must be returned
Returns:
a String containing the point's coordinates enclosed within parentheses

pointToString

public static String pointToString(Point point)
Returns what Point.toString() should have returned (without the initial "Point" that the toString() default implementation returns).

Parameters:
point - the point of which a String representation must be returned
Returns:
a String containing the point's coordinates enclosed within parentheses
